item.title: Setting up Rosbridge in a docker container
item.description: Introduction This article shows the following: how to get rosbridge working in a docker container How to create a custom user in a dockerfile how to set up rosbridge for use with a physical network, even one through a wifi NIC (which has historically been harder) Folder structure .
